rooms.Name: Path to the Forbidden Gate
rooms.Description:
You seem to have found an ancient path.  The path is surrounded
by tall trees that throw eerie shadows and the path is overgrown
by dense undergrowth.  You think you can barely make out a path leaving
to the north.

Exits.Description: The path seems a little less overgrown...

rooms.Name: Forbidden Path
rooms.Description:
The path seems a little less dense as you force your way through
the undergrowth.  You wonder when this path was last used and
what might be waiting for you at the end of this path.

Exits.Description: The paths appears to continue north.....
You see a heavily overgrown path...

rooms.Name: Approaching the Glowing Portal
rooms.Description:
You notice that the path is no longer overgrown and seems well
kept.  To the north you can see a huge gate and you begin to
wonder what is on the other side.

rooms.Name: Glowing Portal
rooms.Description:
A huge glowing portal lays before you.  You see a horrible 
black landscape dimly on the other side that sends a shiver
down your spine.  Are you brave enough to risk the unknown portal?

Exits.Description: You see a path leading to the south....
You see a shining light and a dim landscape on the other side...

rooms.Name: On the Other Side
rooms.Description:
A black landscape spreads out before you.  Huge gaping holes dot
the landscape and you wonder what creatures lurk in this
desolate place.  You see a building to the east and mountains
to the north.

Exits.Description: You see a path to the east...

rooms.Name: Path Approaching a building
rooms.Description:
As you follow this paved path you see a building slowly getting
larger.  You wonder what things are brave enough to live
in such a desolate path.  SUDDENLY you slip and barely regain
your balance before falling into a huge hole.  You realize
that you better pay careful attention to your surroundings.

Exits.Description: Path seems to approach a glowing portal...

rooms.Name: Path Before the Building
rooms.Description:
The road seems well kept here, even if seldom used.  You see 
a large fence ahead of you and what appears to be a guard
house.

Exits.Description: You see a large fence to the north.....
The path continues to the west.....

rooms.Name: The Gate
rooms.Description:
A huge fence surging with electricity stands before you.  You
see a small slot in the fence.  A guard house stands to your
west and a guard appears and says, "Stand where you are and
identify yourselves immediately!!"

Exits.Description: A huge gate barrs your entrance.
A path leading to the south...

rooms.Name: Inside the Guard House
rooms.Description:
You see huge windows facing the gate and realize the guards can
see anyone approaching from the south.  A small table lies in
the center of the room and a huge computer system dominates
the west wall dotted by many screens showing different
sections of the gate.  You realize that these people don't
like uninvited guests.

rooms.Name: Courtyard
rooms.Description:
You stand within the boundaries of the fence and see the building in
the distance.  You realize that if anyone did get past the guards that
they would easily be seen before getting to the building.

rooms.Name: Courtyard
rooms.Description: A large, open area stands before you.

rooms.Name: Courtyard
rooms.Description: A large, open area stands before you.

rooms.Name: Courtyard
rooms.Description: A large, open area stands before you.

rooms.Name: Courtyard
rooms.Description: A large, open area stands before you.

rooms.Name: Courtyard
rooms.Description: A large, open area stands before you.

rooms.Name: Courtyard
rooms.Description: A large, open space stands before you.

rooms.Name: Courtyard
rooms.Description: A large, open space stands before you.

rooms.Name: Entry Way
rooms.Description:
You see a long tunnel ahead of you leading into a dark building.
There are warning lights everywhere.  You stop in shock as
you see a huge Russian symbol with the American flag next to it.
You can't believe your eyes, these two countries working together.
You begin to wonder what is going on in this secret building.

rooms.Name: Dark Hallway
rooms.Description:
You slowly make your way down a very dark hallway, at the
end of the hallway you can see a faint light.  You wonder
what deadly experiments could be taking place within this
building.

rooms.Name: Dark Hallway
rooms.Description:
In this very dark room you can just make out footprints in
the dust leading towards the north.  You feel a slight draft
coming from the east.

Exits.Description: You see a set of Doors.

rooms.Name: Storage Room
rooms.Description:
Many shelves line the walls.  Some are stacked with electronics
equipment while others have common every day stuff.  Household
cleaning supplies are scattered on the floor.  The pile consists
of mops, brooms, and materials to clean the electronics equipment.

rooms.Name: Esp College
rooms.Description:
You see a huge table surrounded by many chairs.
There are numerous books scattered on the table top
describing topics like esp, telepathy, and out of
body experiences.  This appears to be a college of
some sort.

rooms.Name: Map Room
rooms.Description:
A huge map of the world dominates the floor.  On one wall there
is a map of the United States, while the wall opposite contains
one of Mother Russia.  Other maps clutter the room lying on shelves
or on the huge oak table in the middle of the room.

rooms.Name: Path into the Mountains
rooms.Description:
You find yourself following a small path that heads towards
the mountains.  It is difficult to navigate due to the small
rocks continually sliding out from under your feet.  It appears
that this path may lead to those tall peaks in the mountains.

rooms.Name: Path in the Mountains
rooms.Description:
The path seems to be steadily climbing higher into the mountains.
You wonder why this path is hardly used and what might lie at the
end.  The path appears to be getting a little better, at least as
footing goes, that is.

rooms.Name: Splits in the Path
rooms.Description:
The path seems very solid here.  You breathe a sigh of relief
after navigating that very treacherous stretch leading up to
here.  The path appears to continue to the north and what looks
like a crevice ascends upwards here.

rooms.Name: The Crevice
rooms.Description:
The walls are very close together here, and you can just
barely squeeze through.  The walls are pocked with cracks
which provied excellent hand holds for climbing upwards.
It is very dark and a little scary in here.  Hope you're
not Claustraphobic.

Exits.Description: What appears to be a ledge...

rooms.Name: Quiet Room
rooms.Description:
This place is designed totally for comfort.  Reclining chairs occupy
the center of the room.  There is a small desk against one wall for
writing and a comfortable couch rests against the other.  You realize
this is where the telepaths can rest and talk to other people using
their ability.

rooms.Name: Hallway
rooms.Description:
You are in a well lit hallway with pictures depicting strange and
unique events lining the wall.  The floor is covered in black carpet
and you make no noise to mark your passage.

rooms.Name: Hallway
rooms.Description:
The floor is covered by thick, black carpet to keep any noise from distracting
the esp-ers.  You see more weird drawings hanging on the walls here.  A few
tall potted plants set against both walls try in vain to add some color to
this dismal place.

rooms.Name: Coffee Break
rooms.Description:
The biggest coffee maker you have ever seen stands on a table against
the wall.  You see a table scattered with papers and encircled by
well-worn chairs.  This is probably where a lot ot thinking takes place.

rooms.Name: Lunch Room
rooms.Description:
A large serving line starts along the east wall.   Table
and chairs line the west wall.  This place is spotless and
you realize it must take alot of work to clean up after all
these people.

rooms.Name: Office
rooms.Description:
A large desk is the main focal object in the room.  A huge computer
sits on the desk and the printer hasn't stopped since you entered the
room.  A huge map of the world spans the back wall.  Four phones sit on
the desk for convenient use.  This is where all the decisions are made.

rooms.Name: Obeservation Point
rooms.Description:
Three large chairs stand in the center of the room.  A large glass viewing
window takes up most of the main wall.  This room appears to serve only one
purpose:  to allow the people here to observe the activities in the next room.

rooms.Name: Guard Room
rooms.Description:
A weapons rack covers the east wall.  A large table is in the
center of the room.  It seems that you have interrupted a poker
game by entering this room.  The guards really don't seem happy
about this interruption.

rooms.Name: Examination Room
rooms.Description:
A large table takes up most of the room.  You see numerous tools suitable
for performing autopsies.  Though some of them look out of place even for
that purpose.  A huge light on the east wall illuminates the entire room.
A small intercom is located on the one wall under a huge glass window.  
Blood covers the floor and this whole place just radiates pure EVIL!!!

rooms.Name: The Ledge
rooms.Description:
This ledge is very windy and you barely have room to stand on it.
This provides a breather for the treachous climb you just endured
to get to this point.  You realize if you stand here to long the
wind will blow you right off the mountain.

Exits.Description: Hmm, the wall looks like to may be a secret door.

rooms.Name: The Entry-way of Ferenczy Tower
rooms.Description:
This is a dark, dismal place.  Trophies of war line the wall from
forgotten battles.  This room displays the fearsome battle powers of
this family of Wamphyri.  You realize that these are the powerful
fighters of this land and thrive on death and destruction.

rooms.Name: Black Hallway
rooms.Description:
A very dark hallway chocked with dust, you can barely make out footprints
on the floor.  This hallway doesn't seem to see much traffic.  More
trophies of war line the wall, showing more of the glory connected
to the Ferenczy name.

rooms.Name: The Cellar
rooms.Description:
This is a dark, damp cellar.  There is an overpowering stench of mold and
decay.  This place is lined with shadows and you hear a few noises that you
credit to rats or mice.   You pick up a slight sense of evil radiating from
your surroundings.

Exits.Description: An old trapdoor with rusted hinges..

rooms.Name: Black Stairway Room
rooms.Description:
A huge black, spiral stairway dominates the center of the room.
Huge shields line the wall, showing the past rulers of the Ferenczy
house.  A Huge tapestry showing the real ruler of this tower hangs
on the eastern wall, this picture alone shows the total evil that
this person represents.

Exits.Description: Hate radiates from behind the dark door...

rooms.Name: Domain of Thibor Ferenczy
rooms.Description:
A huge room, totally devoid of light.  The hate in this room strikes
you like a physical blow upon entering.  For the creature who
makes his residence here hates all living things, especially the one
who gave him life above all else.

Exits.Description: The dark black door is smeared with blood...

rooms.Name: Pitch Black Cellar
rooms.Description:
A huge, pitch black cellar.  This place for some reason doesn't smell
like decay, but does radiate evil.  You see a large comfortable
chair in the center of the room.  You wonder what Thibor is hiding
down here.

rooms.Name: Top of the Dark Stairwell
rooms.Description:
You finally ascend to the top of the spiral staircase.  You are
confronted with huge, double doors bearing the Ferenczy coat of
arms.  Two statues stand guard forever over these golden doors.
You sense great evil beyond those doors.

Exits.Description: A huge set of double doors with Ferenczy Crest...

rooms.Name: Dark Hall
rooms.Description:
This room lacks light in any form.  You judge by the echo of your 
footsteps that the room must be quite large.  The complete lack of
light must be playing tricks with your eyes because you think you
just saw something move across the room.  Darkness and evil permeate
this room.  Perhaps you should be moving along.

Exits.Description: A huge set of doors with Ferenczy Crest...

rooms.Name: Dark Hall
rooms.Description:
A huge gothic tapestry dominates one of the walls here.  It depicts
Ferenczy in battle against their enemies.  Each inhabitant of this 
tower is shown in all his evil glory as he vanquishes foes while 
covered in blood.

rooms.Name: Before the Dark Throne
rooms.Description:
A huge Throne looms directly up.  Two huge, black marble statues of
Guardian beasts stand on either side of the throne.  A huge two-handed
sword is mounted on the wall above the throne.  The person who occupies
the throne radiates pure and total evil.

rooms.Name: Throne of Ferenczy
rooms.Description:
A black, crystal throne dominates the center of the room.  Two torches
stand to either side, casting their unnatural glow.  The throne's arm-
rests each end in a human skull that has rubies for its eyes.  Ancient
words of evil are etched all over the statue sending an eerie feeling 
down your spine.  An overpowering sense of evil batters at your senses.
It seems to come from the throne itself.  This whole room is covered with
blood stains, especially the throne itself.

rooms.Name: The Path of Fools
rooms.Description:
Why are you on this path?  Are you that STUPID?  Don't you know this
path leads to your destruction?  Don't you know you will suffer horrible
torture that will leave you praying to die, before they finally grant
your plea?  Are you that stupid to continue on to your own destruction?
It appears you are that foolish, but what can you expect from foolish
mortals, come we will enjoy your blood.

rooms.Name: Path of Fools Continues
rooms.Description:
SLAP!!! SLAP!!! SLAP!!! Haven't you figured it out yet if you don't 
leave now you will suffer one of the most painful deaths ever imagined,
one given at the hands of the Wamphryi.  Foolish Mortals we are WARNING
you to turn around and flee now, for you will lose more than your life,
you could lose your SOUL.

rooms.Name: The Path of Fools comes to an End
rooms.Description:
Fine, have it your way you stupid mortal.  We tried to warn you, but would
you listen, NOPE NOT YOU, you think you know it all huh?  Fine with us,
we tried our hardest to warn you, you saw it we did everything in our
power to make you turn back.  So be it, come to your destruction, who
knows we might feel generous and make it fast, *ROFL*, yeah right.

rooms.Name: Entrance to the Tower of Despair
rooms.Description:
Two large marble doors loom ahead of you.  They have ancient carvings
in a long forgotten language covering most of the service area.  The
only symbol you recognize gives you a bone-chilling shiver down your
spine for it is the ancient symbol of utter despair.  Remember foolish
mortal despair leads to destruction, probably yours.  There seems to
be a faded message written on the doors.

Exits.Description:
Huge doors with faded carvings, a strong sense of hopelessness comes
from behind these doors.

ExtraDescs.Description:
You are about to enter the Tower of despair.  Utter despair awaits you
within.  Even hope isn't brave enough to dare the secrets of this 
tower.  Are you foolish enough to tread where even hope, that brings
light in the darkest hour, doesn't dare to tread.  If your stupid
enough to brave this tower, we are sure death will thank you for
your gift.

rooms.Name: Utter Despair has Begun
rooms.Description:
Suddenly, a feeling of hopelessness starts within you. You realize that
you have no chance against the creatures of evil that lurk within these
walls.  Why even bother they will destroy you without a second thought,
condeming your soul to horrible torment for enternity.  You only wish
is to turn and flee this total blackness that seems to stem from
the bowels of hell itself.

Exits.Description: The secret door seems rusted shut from disuse...
Torture and Pain awaits as Satan himself beckons you to your destruction.

rooms.Name: The Path of Sorrow
rooms.Description:
You have made a hard choice and a very brave one.  This path has seen
Sorrow that no mortal should ever have to witness.  The sorrow of love
and lost this path has seen many times.  Though even this path has
seen unbelievable happiness stem from unpentrable sorrow.

rooms.Name: Path of Sorrow
rooms.Description:
Large tears run down the walls here for this very path weeps for one
of the occupants of this tower.  Its knows the sorrow of losing a loved
one or being deprived of watching them grow up and experiencing 
there joys.  This path weeps for all the lost chances that all mortals
have missed, for this path knows only sorrow here and has never seen
happiness over the centuries of its existance.

rooms.Name: Bend in the Path of Sorrow
rooms.Description:
Huge tears roll down the walls here also, but you're horrified by them
for they are the tears of a Wamphyri staining the whole room a crimson
color.  This bend represents the mortal's unmeasurable sorrow when realizing
he had become the very thing he had spent his life combating.  This bend
represents the turn from sorrow to evil that lurks in everyone's heart,
just waiting for its chance to grasp control.

rooms.Name: Room of Sorrow
rooms.Description:
The level of sorrow in this room draws you in and tears run down your
cheeks.  The intensity of sorrow in this room totally overrides the
rest of your senses and all you want to do is to cry forever for the
tortured souls of mankind and even for the souls of foul creatures,
like the Wamphyri, for here sorrow for all things is felt.

rooms.Name: Path of Horror
rooms.Description:
Mutilated corpses litter the ground at your feet causing the floor
to become treacherous due to the blood pooling on it.  SUDDENLY,
a huge beast with tremendous claws and blood-stained fangs leaps at
your throat, but passes through harmlessly to your great relief.  
Horrible laughter fills your ears making you want to flee for your
life.  To your total horror, you realize that there is no escape.
The only option is to continue forward, seeking the origins of that
hideous laughter.

rooms.Name: Path of Horror
rooms.Description:
Blood darkens the entire room.  The floor is covered by it, making it
hard to walk and it slowly runs down the wall.  Spectre's and souls 
drift pass you and sometimes through you, chilling you to the bone.
One ghost lets out an earth shattering screams and flies directly
at you, but harmlessly passes through you.  The hideous laughter
once more fills the room or is it only in your mind?

Exits.Description: The trapdoor looks old from disuse...

rooms.Name: Domain of Dramal Doombody
rooms.Description:
A simple living chamber.  A huge tapestry depicting Dramal covered
in blood from his enemies hangs on the one wall.  A bed lays in the
one corner and you noticed old blood stains cover the floors.

Exits.Description: The trapdoor looks old from disuse...

rooms.Name: Path of Horror
rooms.Description:
You enter a smoke filled room, SUDDENLY a huge dragon lears out of
the smoke and breaths a cloud of acid towards you.  Some how you
seem to be still alive and a cold, calculating voice speaks to you out
of the smoke, "Foolish mortal!  Did you think I would let you did that
quickly?  No, my friend, your death will be infinitely more painful!!!

rooms.Name: An Empty Room
rooms.Description:
This room seems to serve no purpose.  It has nothing in it and dust thickly
covers the floor, making you realize that no one has entered this
room for a very long time.

rooms.Name: Domain of Lascula Longtooth
rooms.Description:
Strange devices litter the room.  This whole room speaks of mystical
powers beyond your understanding.  You see large claw marks deeply
indented into the walls all over this room.  This whole room is designed
for comfort, including the large table and soft cushion chairs in the
corner.

rooms.Name: An empty room
rooms.Description:
A room that appears to never be used any more and is covered thickly by
dust.  This room seems to have been forgotten by its creators.

rooms.Name: Domain of Shaithis
rooms.Description:
This whole room seems to be a bit over done.  Everything in this room
is of the best quality available, including the ancient antique chairs,
the old wooden bed, and the black desk against the wall.  This person
enjoys the finer points of life, sometimes too much.

Exits.Description: The home of the Dark One

rooms.Name: Stairs of Sorrow
rooms.Description:
A large set of stairs made of human tears with a mix of red tears from
Wamphyri stands in the center of the room.  The stairs spiral down into
sorrow and darkness for all who follow this path, but great happiness
can lie at the end of the greatest sorrow.

rooms.Name: Stairs of Sorrow
rooms.Description:
These stairs are formed of thousands upon thousands of tears shed in
sorrow.  You get a weird feeling as each step seems to give out and
at the last second hold before you go falling through the step formed
of tears.  These steps transcend the ages reflecting the sorrow since
the beginning of time itself.

rooms.Name: Path of Shame
rooms.Description:
This path reflects the shame of one of the occupants of this tower, but
it also reflects the shame of the world.  You feel an over powering
sense of shame for deceiving others and not living up to the expectations
that people have set for you.  This whole room is full of shades and
ghosts that have shamed people so bad in there mortal existance they
are bound to wonder the world for enternity.

rooms.Name: Stairs of Sorrow
rooms.Description:
These stairs have a redish tint to them as you descend them.  They reflect
the Wamphyri who still have mortal feelings, these Wamphryi can still
shed tears in sorrow for lost love ones and lost memories that they
can never re-live.  Though as the stairs show by the barest of red
hints these are few and very far between.

rooms.Name: End of the Path of Sorrow
rooms.Description:
Even sorrow comes to an end.  After thousands upon thousands of tears you
finally come to the ender of sorrow for everything must come to an
end, even the power of sorrow comes to an end in death or the
return to happiness.

rooms.Name: Path of Shame
rooms.Description:
Shame still batters at your senses, for you realize all the time you
failed to live up to your family's standards or left a friend down 
because you just didn't feel like helping them.  Tears run down your
cheeks for the shame you feel deep inside, it even touches your
very soul which cries for the shame you have done over the years.
Your greatest wish is to leave this path.

Exits.Description: The cage door is securely shut...

rooms.Name: Loyal Guardian Room
rooms.Description:
Slaughtered carcasses litter the room and the smell of death is 
overpowering.  However, you notice that there is just enough food
to feed the occupants of this room.  They are loyal to their master
even facing death to protect him, for he leads their pack and they
have sworn to follow him.

Exits.Description: The cage door seems to be securely shut...

rooms.Name: Domain of the Wolf Wamphyri
rooms.Description:
You see a very comfortable living space, but it is shredded by claw
marks.  The floor is scratched with deep grooves by very sharp
claws.  This whole area seems to be a living space for an animal
instead of a human.

rooms.Name: Twisted Path
rooms.Description:
This path has many twists and turns and at times it seems your walking
upside down, or is it your imagination.  Your senses are just as
confused because at times you feel great evil battering at your mental
defenses, while at other times curiosity replaces the feeling of evil.

rooms.Name: Bloody Path
rooms.Description:
The floor here is covered with blood.  A trail of greenish ooze seems
to shadow the path of blood, making you wonder what might have been
following this path.

rooms.Name: Bloody Room
rooms.Description:
Blood covers the entire surface area of this room.  The walls and ceiling
continously drip blood, while the floor is covered with pools of blood.
It all seems to run down a huge drain in the middle of the room.

rooms.Name: Bloody Drain
rooms.Description:
The drain seems to have hand holds carved into the wall, but the holds
are very slippery with the constant flow of blood running over them.
Blood pours all over your clothes and skin as you force your way down
this drain.

rooms.Name: Blood Pool
rooms.Description:
A slight walkway surronds a huge pool of crimson blood.  The crimson
lake seems very inviting and you feel like going for a refreshing
swim, wait was that a TENTACLE you just saw.  Maybe swimming isn't
a good idea, but the crimson pool seems so inviting.

Exits.Description:
A trapdoor leading to your total destruction.
Shaithis appears before you and beckons to you, "Come down
You foolish mortal we like watching mortals as you slowly and
painfully feel death."

rooms.Name: Entrance to Karen's Lair
rooms.Description:
Huge double doors block your passage here.  For this is the ruler of Wamphyri
and she rules this tower.  She is different from normal Wamphyri because
she can show the compassion of normal mortals, but make no mistake
uninvited guests will be dealt with very harshly.

rooms.Name: Hall of Chaos
rooms.Description:
This room reflects chaos in all its forms.  Things lay scattered
around, some whole, most of them broken or destroyed.  For this
is where Karen wages her inner conflict between her feelings for
Harry Keogh and her natural feelings of being a Wamphyri.  You notice
a huge table ripped to pieces like it was a piece of paper and you
begin to respect the awesome power of the Wamphyri.

rooms.Name: Hall of Chaos
rooms.Description:
Servants are rushing everywhere here.  They keep crashing into each
other, running over each other, and kicking each other out of their
way.  This seems to be total chaos, but then again, Karen keeps changing
her mind so much that the poor Trogs never know what is coming next.

rooms.Name: Hall of Chaos
rooms.Description:
CRASH!! SMASH!! Things fly every which way in this room causing you
to dive behind a smashed table for cover.  You see trogs hurtling
things everywhere because their mistress has told them to smash assorted
objects.  These poor trogs realize that she will probably change her
mind and kill them for smashing something she liked.  Then again, what
can you expect from Lady Karen as she struggles with her mortal love 
and her Wamphyri tendencies for destruction.

rooms.Name: Hall of Chaos
rooms.Description:
A fire-breathing dragon leers out of the smoke and passes
through you harmlessly.  A grey wolf leaps at your throat, but
disappears into thin air.  You realize this is where Karen is
letting her aggressions out by creating illusions to torment
visitors.  SUDDENLY a fighter beast attacks you, thank god that
was an illusion.

rooms.Name: Royal Guard Room
rooms.Description:
A pitch black room stands before you.  You get a chill down your
spine as you hear something slithering against the wall.  Wait!
Did you just see a wing-like appendage flash out of the shadow?
Glowing red eyes peer at you from every direction and you realize
that this will be a fight to the death or nothing.

rooms.Name: Darkness
rooms.Description:
This room lacks even the smallest amount of light.  You here a huge
scraping noise as if something is slithering across the floor
towards you.  Huge red eyes peer out of the darkness at you and you
suddenly realize the last defense of Lady Karen is still the huge
dweller that doesn't like to be disturbed.

rooms.Name: Throne of Karen
rooms.Description:
A pair of crystal thrones stand before you.  One is of the deepest
black crystal you have ever seen.  It is carved into the form of two
fighting beasts clashing in battle.  The heads are locked in combat
with one sinking its fangs into the neck of the other, while there is
just enough room between the bodies for the seat of the throne.  The
other throne is of purest white crystal and has carvings of nature all
over its surface.  It is obvious that the occupant of the white throne
wishes to remember their old world.

rooms.Name: Royal Treasury
rooms.Description:
This room contains Karen's gold, for blood interests her more than
these shiny gold coins that destroy so many mortal lives through
greed.

rooms.Name: Bowels of Hell
rooms.Description:
You have wandered into the fiery bowels of hell.  You are so struck with
terror that you almost fail to notice that the sickening crunch you just
heard was your spine being shattered by a huge red trident.  Your intes-
tines have been ruptured and an unbearable pain begins to surge through
your body.  You pray for death to come quickly.  "Foolish mortal!"  the
wielder or the trident bellows.  "There is no escape from this torment.
Death himself would not dare step into the deepest pit of hell!"  The
gods pity someone so stupid as to wander into eternal darkness to visit
with the incarnate evil.  You are rescued from eternal damnation by
divine forces.

rooms.Name: Devouring Blood
rooms.Description:
Blood rushes up to cover you and SUDDENLY you feel unbelievable pain.
The blood is slowly eating your skin away like acid as it drags
you down.  The pain reaches a level you never dreamed of and for
some reason you unable to pass out.  "Foolish Mortal," speaks
Shaithis in your mind, "that would be to nice to let you pass out,
making you feel the pain is more enjoyable to watch, muhahahahaha!!"

rooms.Name: The Domain of the Dark One
rooms.Description:
A pit of evil and despair assult your eyes.  Here is the home of the
dark one, he has been chained here for so  many years not even his creators
remember how long anymore.  He was a mistake of science and became so
powerful even his creators couldn't control him.  Finally they tricked
him into this chamber sealing it forever, well to you found it.
